headline: Biden in NYC to outline strategy to fight gun violence
author: Josh Boak
sentences: NEW YORK (AP) — Visiting a city still reeling from recent shootings of police, President Joe Biden will outline his administration’s strategy for confronting the national surge in gun violence and bloodshed in an address Thursday at the headquarters of the nation’s largest police force.

It’s a chance for the president to try to push back against criticism from Republicans that he is soft on crime, and to distance himself from those in the left flank of his Democratic Party who want to shift funding away from police departments to social spending programs.
